result.eng: The smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ga: dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.orig: dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.html: dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ponchtml: dá laġad an t-ualaċ atá uirṫi is sásta a ḃíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.

result.ga: ní féidir liom an t-ualach a iompar
result.orig: ní féidir liom an t-ualach a iompar
result.html: ní féidir liom an t-ualach a iomparI can't carry the load.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir liom an t-ualaċ a iomparI can't carry the load.

result.eng: You divide the load between two lorries.
result.ga: roinneann tú an t-ualach idir dhá leoraí
result.orig: roinneann tú an t-ualach idir dhá leoraí
result.html: roinneann tú an t-ualach idir dhá leoraíYou divide the load between two lorries.
result.ponchtml: roinneann tú an t-ualaċ idir ḋá leoraíYou divide the load between two lorries.
